common_0185_friend_02: I’m not talking to you two. You can shove off.[VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0185_rival_01:
Wait, I know you... Aren’t you Arven?
You’re enrolled in the humanities track, right?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_rival_02a:
And aren’t you the son of that Pokémon
researcher—Professor Sada?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_rival_02b:
And aren’t you the son of that Pokémon
researcher—Professor Turo?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_friend_03a: Doesn’t matter who my mom is![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_03b: Doesn’t matter who my dad is![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_04:
The real issue here is what in the world this
Pokémon is doing out here!\c
And what is with this form it’s in?![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_select_01: I met it at the bottom of this cliff...
common_0185_select_02: It saved me from a tight spot...
common_0185_rival_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]See, we heard this strange cry, and we tried to
investigate, but [VAR TRNAME(0000)] fell\r
off\r
a cliff...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_rival_04:
That Pokémon saved h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer, but it seems like it
wore itself out in the process. It got kinda...\r
slumpy afterward.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_rival_05:
But you shoulda seen it before! It looked totally
different—it was unbelievably strong![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_friend_05:
Well, yeah. As it should be. But it can’t fight
while it’s like this.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_06:
The form [VAR PKNAME(0001)] takes in battle... That’s its
true form.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_rival_06:
[VAR PKNAME(0001)]? Is that this Pokémon’s name?
How’d you know it?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_friend_16: You can’t go in the lab. It’s locked.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_11:
I don’t remember ever seeing you around. But
given the uniform...you go to the academy too,\r
do you?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_15:
[VAR PKNAME(0001)] isn’t the sort of Pokémon that any
old Trainer can hope to command. It’s special.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_rival_16: Special how? What sort of Pokémon is it?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_friend_12:
You think you’re up to ordering [VAR PKNAME(0001)]
around? Then how ’bout I test your worthiness?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_17a: Heh! Well, look at you—quite the little go-getter![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_17b:
I’m saying I want to test you. You can’t just leave
me hanging here![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_18:
I’ve been feeling all out of sorts, so I’m gonna
use this battle to blast these doldrums away![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_13:
I guess I wasn’t ever going to stand a chance
using some Pokémon I’d only just caught...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_rival_15:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]... Were you going
easy\r
on\r
him?\r
You\r
could\r
have\r
won that.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_friend_14:
Yeah, you’re in some serious trouble if you can’t
even beat someone like me.\c
I’d be worried about my future, if I were you.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_07:
But if you really think you can take [VAR PKNAME(0001)]
off my hands for me...you’ll need this.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_08: It’s the Poké Ball that brute’s been kept in.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_friend_10:
Anyway, that thing’s your problem now, not mine.
Good luck.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_0185_rival_07: What? Oye! Can you not hear me or something?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_rival_08:
Fine, be that way! But you better actually show
up for school![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_rival_10:
That Arven guy definitely knows more than he’s
letting on.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_rival_11:
Next time, he and I are battling! I’m gonna wring
some answers outta him![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0185_rival_12:
But oh, right—we gotta climb the lighthouse!
Can’t wait to show you the view of our school![VAR 0114(0004)]
